body:
Hey, everyone!
I just came here to announce that my texture pack is finally done! :D
I worked very hard on it and even made 6, x12-speed videos on it that are in a play list here :3

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/jskq8zt2bsms2rt/Minimalist%20texture%20pack.zip?dl=0
New download (made a few improvements :3) :https://www.dropbox.com/s/2xlnqdpqwuoe9sn/MPT%20%28improved%29.zip?dl=0


Also, if you want, you have my permission to use anything you want in your own pack or whatever else you may want it for :3

Hope you enjoy it! :D

title: Minimalist texture pack (Completed)! :D

replies.body:
Mhm.

May I ask what the resolution is?

And can I take all the blocks for my FPS pack?
replies.body_tagged:
Mhm.

May I ask what the resolution is?

And can I take all the blocks for my FPS pack?

replies.body: It's 16x16, and sure, man, go crazy xD

replies.body: I really love it! Looks great!
replies.body_tagged: I really love it! Looks great!

replies.body:
Thanks for all the feedback! :D
I understand that this pack obviously isn't for everyone-- some people don't like it to look so cartoony-- but I'm really glad there are some people who enjoy it ;D
Also, if I feel like it, I might do all the tools/food, so stay tuned if you want to see some more speed arts of those x3
